title: Viking 36 5 Series Ultra-Premium Outdoor Natural Gas Stainless Steel Grill VGBQ53624NSS - Overview
description:
Viking 36 5 Series Ultra-Premium Outdoor Natural Gas Stainless Steel Grill - VGBQ53624NSS
http://www.abt.com/product/78496/Viking-36-5-Series-Ultra-Premium-Outdoor-Natural-Gas-Stainless-Steel-Grill-VGBQ53624NSS.html?utm_source=youtube&utm_medium=video&utm_campaign=VGBQ53624NSS_20160425

Viking Professional 5 Series grills may be built into a custom enclosure built-in with stainless steel cabinetry or used on a portable stainless steel cart.  The 25000 BTU stainless steel grill burners and heavy-duty rotisserie easily handle any grilling challenge - from seared tuna fillets to 25-lb. smoked turkeys.
Features:
• Installation Options
The choice is yours. Building in or pairing with a portable outdoor cart or cabinet gives you plenty of installation options.
• Flavor Generator System
Capture and create flavor as grill drippings become smoke atop our briquette flavor generator system. In addition to providing smokey flavor it generates even heat distribution while protecting the burner from debris.
• Numerical Thermometer
Easy-to-read hermetically-sealed numerical thermometer gives approximate temperatures from 0 to 750 degrees F and never fogs.
• Easy Cleanup Outdoor
Grease management system features a removable drip tray with roller bearing glides. Burner drip guards aid in grease management by channeling liquid down to the drip tray.
• Halogen Canopy Lighting
Two halogen lights mounted on the inside of grill canopy provide ample lighting for nighttime grilling.
• Stainless Steel Grates
Stainless steel grates are an excellent conductor of heat to cook food evenly and create restaurant-style grill marks.
• Gourmet-Glo™ Infrared Burner
A better spin on outdoor cooking. Cook meat perfectly with the 15000 BTU Gourmet-Glo™ Infrared Rotisserie Burner with a 55 lbs. maximum capacity on the rotisserie rod.
• 120V Electric Ignition
Burners ignite at light/high position and have automatic re-ignition system if extinguished.
• Removable Smoker Box
Smoke your way to better flavor. The smoker box allows for smoking with wood chips or enjoying extra grilling space by removing it all together.
• Viking Blue LED Illumination
An elegant ray of blue light washes over each control knob for nighttime grilling.
